hackathon-description-text: HackIndia is India's largest hackathon yet, and it's bringing together an amalgamation of passionate developers, designers, and entrepreneurs. Hosted by Bangalore's PES University, and sponsored by GitHub and Pebble among other tech companies, HackIndia aims to bring the hacking culture to India.

hackathon-location-address: PES College, I Phase, Phase 1, Banashankari Stage I, Banashankari, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560050, India
hackathon-description-header: The largest hackathon yet in the world's largest democracy.
